summary: Dubrovnik is a beautiful city in Croatia, located by the Adriatic Sea. It's a very popular tourist spot because of its old, well-preserved buildings and walls from the Middle Ages. The city has a rich history, dating back to the 7th century, and was once an important trading center. It was even named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1979. Over time, Dubrovnik was ruled by different empires, experienced earthquakes, and was at war. Today, it's a beloved place to visit, but it gets very crowded with tourists.
title: Dubrovnik
